quotables.title: Quotable: 'Christ Lives for Us!'
quotables.author: John Calvin
quotables.teaser: What is Jesus doing right now? Living for us.
quotables.quote: What sort of pledge, and how great is this love towards us! Christ lives for us, not for Himself!
quotables.content: Hebrews 7:25 - [Jesus] is able to save to the uttermost those who draw near to God through him, since he always lives to make intercession for them.

quotables.title: Quotable: 'Books Don't Change People ... Sentences Do.'
quotables.author: John Piper
quotables.teaser: Books don't change people ... sentences do.
quotables.quote: Books don't change people; paragraphs do, sometimes even sentences.
